sql.query:
INSERT INTO guardians
(firstName, lastName, relationship, family_uuid, uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{guardianfirstname}} */, :P2 /* {{guardianlastname}} */, :P3 /* {{guardianrelationship}} */, :P4 /* {{family_uuid}} */, :P5 /* {{guardian_uuid}} */)

INSERT INTO phoneNumbers
(phone, type, guardian_uuid, uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{phone}} */, :P2 /* {{phonetype}} */, :P3 /* {{guardian_uuid}} */, :P4 /* {{'ph_'+UUID.replace('-','')}} */)

SELECT uuid
FROM phoneNumbers
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{insert_phone.identity}} */

UPDATE guardians
SET default_phone = :P1 /* {{query_phone_uuid.uuid}} */
WHERE uuid = :P2 /* {{guardian_uuid}} */

INSERT INTO emails
(address, guardian_uuid, type, uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{email}} */, :P2 /* {{guardian_uuid}} */, :P3 /* {{emailtype}} */, :P4 /* {{'em_'+UUID.replace('-','')}} */)

SELECT uuid
FROM emails
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{insert_email.identity}} */

UPDATE guardians
SET default_email = :P1 /* {{query_email_uuid.uuid}} */
WHERE uuid = :P2 /* {{guardian_uuid}} */

INSERT INTO students
(firstName, lastName, dob, rollSheetComments, rollSheetMedical, additionalMedical, gender, classlevel_uuid, uuid, family) VALUES (:P1 /* {{studentfirstname}} */, :P2 /* {{studentlastname}} */, :P3 /* {{dob}} */, :P4 /* {{rollsheetcomments}} */, :P5 /* {{rollsheetmedical}} */, :P6 /* {{additionalmedical}} */, :P7 /* {{sex}} */, :P8 /* {{classlevel}} */, :P9 /* {{student_uuid}} */, :P10 /* {{family_uuid}} */)
